title: Geologists Say Quartz And Few Earthquakes Can Make A Giant Gold Nugget
content: Humanitys fascination with gold stretches back thousands of years. Gold mining is described in ancient Greek and Roman sources, and gold rushes  especially in the 19th century played a powerful role in shaping the modern world.
summary: Humanitys fascination with gold stretches back thousands of years. Gold mining is described in ancient Greek and Roman sources, and gold rushes  especially in the 19th century played a powerful role in shaping the modern world.

title: Sunken Village Emerges Amidst Greece's Record Drought
content: Record-breaking temperatures and prolonged drought in Greece have exposed a sunken village in Athens' main reservoir for the first time in 30 years.
summary: Record-breaking temperatures and prolonged drought in Greece have exposed a sunken village in Athens' main reservoir for the first time in 30 years.

title: All You Need To Know About Brunei's Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah, His Family
content: Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah's primary home, the Istana Nurul Iman Palace, is the world's largest residential palace.

title: Frozen Body Found In Pennsylvania Cave Finally Identified After 50 Years
content: A cold case that baffled authorities and intrigued locals for nearly half a century has finally come to a close.
summary: A cold case that baffled authorities and intrigued locals for nearly half a century has finally come to a close.

title: "I Ask For Forgiveness...": Benjamin Netanyahu On Death Of Israeli Hostages
content: Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday sought forgiveness for not being able to save the lives of six Iseraeli hostages, whose bodies were found in a tunnel in Gaza.
summary: Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday sought forgiveness for not being able to save the lives of six Iseraeli hostages, whose bodies were found in a tunnel in Gaza.

title: 129 Killed In Attempted Prison Break In Congo
content: At least 129 people were killed during a weekend prison break attempt at the largest jail in the Democratic Republic of Congo, the interior minister said on Tuesday.
summary: At least 129 people were killed during a weekend prison break attempt at the largest jail in the Democratic Republic of Congo, the interior minister said on Tuesday.

title: Elon Musk "Can't Wait" To Be Part Of Donald Trumps Cabinet
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has confirmed he wants to work with former President Donald Trump in auditing US agencies to identify programmes for cuts.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has confirmed he wants to work with former President Donald Trump in auditing US agencies to identify programmes for cuts.

title: Brazil Top Court Reinstates Jail Terms For 2013 Fire That Killed 242
content: A Brazilian supreme court judge ordered Monday the immediate imprisonment of four people convicted for their role in a nightclub fire that killed 242 people more than a decade ago.
summary: A Brazilian supreme court judge ordered Monday the immediate imprisonment of four people convicted for their role in a nightclub fire that killed 242 people more than a decade ago.

title: Climate Change Puts South Korea's Beloved Kimchi At Risk
content: South Korea's famous kimchi is falling victim to climate change, with scientists, farmers and manufacturers saying the quality and quantity of the napa cabbage that is pickled to make the ubiquitous dish is suffering due to rising temperatures.
summary: South Korea's famous kimchi is falling victim to climate change, with scientists, farmers and manufacturers saying the quality and quantity of the napa cabbage that is pickled to make the ubiquitous dish is suffering due to rising temperatures.

title: NASA Explains "Strange Noises" In Sunita Williams' Starliner Spacecraft
content: NASA has responded to reports claiming "strange noises" being heard by astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore aboard the International Space Station (ISS).
summary: NASA has responded to reports claiming "strange noises" being heard by astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

title: Opinion: India And China May Finally Be Warming Up To Each Other
content: Its not a thaw yet, but there are certainly signs of some warming in the India-China relationship. Of late, there has been an uptick in dialogue to resolve outstanding issues along two friction points in Eastern Ladakh.
summary: Its not a thaw yet, but there are certainly signs of some warming in the India-China relationship. Of late, there has been an uptick in dialogue to resolve outstanding issues along two friction points in Eastern Ladakh.

title: Burnout And Beyond: The Dark Side Of Hustle Culture
content: Hustle culture glorifies relentless work, often at the expense of mental well-being. The constant pressure to be productive can lead to burnout, anxiety, and depression.
summary: Hustle culture glorifies relentless work, often at the expense of mental well-being. The constant pressure to be productive can lead to burnout, anxiety, and depression.

title: Pope Francis Reaches Muslim-Majority Indonesia To Start Asia-Pacific Tour
content: Pope Francis arrived in Muslim-majority Indonesia on Tuesday to kick off a four-nation tour of the Asia-Pacific that will be the longest and farthest of the 87-year-old's papacy.
summary: Pope Francis arrived in Muslim-majority Indonesia on Tuesday to kick off a four-nation tour of the Asia-Pacific that will be the longest and farthest of the 87-year-old's papacy.

title: Indonesian Doctor's Death Exposes "Open Secret" Of Medical School Bullying

title: 11 Students Killed In School Bus Crash In China
content: A school bus ploughed into a crowd of people outside a middle school in eastern China on Tuesday, killing 11 parents and students, state media reported.
summary: A school bus ploughed into a crowd of people outside a middle school in eastern China on Tuesday, killing 11 parents and students, state media reported.

title: Gaza Hostage Guards Have Been Operating Under New Instructions, Says Hamas

title: Inside The World's Largest Palace Which Will Host PM Modi On Brunei Visit

title: Kamala Harris Veep Pick Tim Walz Involved In Highway Crash, JD Vance Reacts

title: Sultan Of Brunei, Owner Of Over 7,000 Cars, Will Welcome PM Modi Today
